#define CVMX_GLOBAL_RESOURCE_NO_LOCKING   (1)
#define CVMX_GLOBAL_RESOURCES_GET_FIELD ( field   ) 
Value:
__cvmx_struct_get_unsigned_field(__cvmx_global_resources_addr,  \
        offsetof(cvmx_global_resources_t, field),       \
        SIZEOF_FIELD(cvmx_global_resources_t, field))

This macro returns a member of the data structure.

The argument "field" is the member name of the structure to read. The return type is a uint64_t.

#define CVMX_GLOBAL_RESOURCES_SET_FIELD ( field,
value   ) 
Value:
__cvmx_struct_set_unsigned_field(__cvmx_global_resources_addr,  \
        offsetof(cvmx_global_resources_t, field),       \
        SIZEOF_FIELD(cvmx_global_resources_t, field), value)

This macro writes a member of the cvmx_global_resources_t structure.

The argument "field" is the member name of the cvmx_global_resources_t to write.

#define CVMX_MAX_GLOBAL_RESOURCES   128
#define CVMX_RESOURCE_ENTRY_GET_FIELD ( addr,
field   ) 
Value:
__cvmx_struct_get_unsigned_field(addr,              \
        offsetof(cvmx_global_resource_entry_t, field),      \
        SIZEOF_FIELD(cvmx_global_resource_entry_t, field))

This macro returns a member of the cvmx_global_resource_entry_t.

The argument "field" is the member name of this structure. the return type is a uint64_t. The "addr" parameter is the physical address of the structure.

This macro writes a member of the cvmx_global_resource_entry_t structure.

The argument "field" is the member name of the cvmx_global_resource_entry_t to write. The "addr" parameter is the physical address of the structure.

Function Documentation

static uint64_t __cvmx_alloc_bootmem_for_global_resources ( int  sz  )  [static]
int __cvmx_bootmem_phy_free ( uint64_t  phy_addr,
uint64_t  size,
uint32_t  flags 
)

Frees a block to the bootmem allocator list.

This must be used with care, as the size provided must match the size of the block that was allocated, or the list will become corrupted.

IMPORTANT: This is only intended to be used as part of named block frees and initial population of the free memory list. *

Parameters:
phy_addr physical address of block
size size of block in bytes.
flags flags for passing options
Returns:
1 on success, 0 on failure

static uint64_t __cvmx_struct_get_unsigned_field ( uint64_t  base,
int  offset,
int  size 
) [inline, static]

This function is the implementation of the get macros defined for individual structure members.

The argument are generated by the macros inorder to read only the needed memory.

Parameters:
base 64bit physical address of the complete structure
offset Offset from the beginning of the structure to the member being accessed.
size Size of the structure member.
Returns:
Value of the structure member promoted into a uint64_t.
static void __cvmx_struct_set_unsigned_field ( uint64_t  base,
int  offset,
int  size,
uint64_t  value 
) [inline, static]

This function is the implementation of the set macros defined for individual structure members.

The argument are generated by the macros in order to write only the needed memory.

Parameters:
base 64bit physical address of the complete structure
offset Offset from the beginning of the structure to the member being accessed.
size Size of the structure member.
value Value to write into the structure
